title: manakkurangu
sahitya:
manakkuran-gaDangAviDil kiDaiyAdE mana ninaikkum eduvum kaiyaDaiyAdE


anupallavi

  manana bhakthi jnAna vairAgyamuDan mAdhavamum sAdhanangaLum duSTa


caraNam    aDi mudal vENDumenr-Avalum vENDum aDaiya vidAda muyarciyum vENDum
  paDiRil UkkamuDan Ekkamum vENDum payanrara aran aruLum vENDum edarkkum
